data.prayer: Spirit, please start new house churches in every neighborhood of the country of Pitcairn Islands.
data.verse: For the earth will be filled with the knowledge of the glory of the Lord as the waters cover the sea.

data.location_label: Photo from the country of Pitcairn Islands
data.section_summary: What needs would people have here?

data.prayer: Jesus, please raise up evangelists to equip your people to share the gospel in Pitcairn Islands.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up

data.prayer: Father, reveal your kingdom to those with a childlike heart in the country of Pitcairn Islands.
data.verse: At that time, Jesus answered, “I thank you, Father, Lord of heaven and earth, that you hid these things from the wise and understanding, and revealed them to infants. Yes, Father, for so it was well-pleasing in your sight.

data.prayer: Spirit, give faith and responsive hearts to the 100 citizens of the the country of Pitcairn Islands.
data.verse: Seek the Lord while he may be found; call upon him while he is near.

data.focus_label: Pray for the city of Adamstown
data.prayer: Pray that God raises up new churches in the city of Adamstown, Pitcairn Islands.
Lord, please make the same Spirit that raised Jesus from the dead give life to those who are called by his name in the country of Pitcairn Islands.
data.verse: But if the Spirit of him who raised up Jesus from the dead dwells in you, he who raised up Christ Jesus from the dead will also give life to your mortal bodies through his Spirit who dwells in you.

data.prayer: Jesus, make the 86 people in the country of Pitcairn Islands who claim to know you, brave enough to let the Bible weigh their thoughts and intentions today.
data.verse: For the word of God is living and powerful, and sharper than any two-edged sword, piercing even to the division of soul and spirit, and of joints and marrow, and is a discerner of the thoughts and intents of the heart.

data.prayer: Father, please make every disciple be a disciple maker, every home a training center, and every church a church planting movement in the country of Pitcairn Islands.
